title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Citizenship Quest: Game-Based U.S. Government

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners explain inter-agency collaboration procedures in the U.S. federal government through simulation games
